# {clipart_name} Seamless Border Clipart

## INSTANT DOWNLOAD

This listing is for a digital download of seamless border clipart elements perfect for creating repeating decorative borders.

## FEATURES

- High-resolution PNG files with transparent backgrounds (300 DPI)
- {dimensions} dimensions
- Seamless horizontal repeating pattern
- Commercial use allowed
- Perfect for endless border designs

## WHAT YOU'LL RECEIVE

- {num_files} PNG file(s) with transparent backgrounds
- Seamless horizontal tiling capability
- License for commercial use

## PERFECT FOR

- Website headers and footers
- Digital scrapbooking borders
- Page dividers and decorative elements
- Social media graphics
- Print design projects
- Invitations and stationery

## HOW TO USE

After purchase, you'll receive an instant download link. The files can be used with various design software like Photoshop, Illustrator, Canva, etc. Simply repeat the pattern horizontally to create seamless borders of any length.

## TERMS OF USE

- Commercial use allowed
- No redistribution of the original files
- No reselling of the original files

Thank you for visiting my shop! If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.
